title: Wrestling the Hulk: My Life Against the Ropes
description: Linda Hogan spent twenty-four years married to American wrestling icon Hulk Hogan. In Wrestling the Hulk , Linda shares her deeply personal stories about life with the WWF superstar—stories of abuse, infidelity, celebrity, her “life on the ropes,” and how the  former VH-1 reality TV star managed to step out of her marriage ring and make a fresh start.
author: Linda  Hogan
